fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may Wildshape and protect a player's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you Wildshape, you gain Basic Defence and Powerful Attack.
- When protecting someone, you will give them Powerful Defence and you will attack anyone who visits them.
- You may only Wildshape 3 times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the adventurers.
